      • getDeviceState

        public org.ezand.telldus.core.domain.State<?> getDeviceState(int id)
                                                      throws org.ezand.telldus.core.TelldusException
        Specified by:
        getDeviceState in interface org.ezand.telldus.core.repository.TelldusRepository
        Parameters:
        id - the device id.
        Returns:
        a State object containing the device type and state. For switches the state will be a RichBoolean. For dimmers the state will either be a RichBoolean or the dim level. It depends on the last sent command to the dimmer-device.
        Throws:
        org.ezand.telldus.core.TelldusException - if tdtool-command fails fatally.

      • turnDeviceOn

        public org.ezand.telldus.core.domain.State<org.ezand.telldus.core.util.RichBoolean> turnDeviceOn(int id)
                                                                                          throws org.ezand.telldus.core.TelldusException
        Will try to switch the device on. If the command fails, the current state of the device will be returned.
        Specified by:
        turnDeviceOn in interface org.ezand.telldus.core.repository.TelldusRepository
        Parameters:
        id - the device id.
        Returns:
        a RichBoolean instance with a positive value if device was switched on successfully, a negative value otherwise.
        Throws:
        org.ezand.telldus.core.TelldusException - if tdtool-command fails fatally.

      • turnDeviceOff

        public org.ezand.telldus.core.domain.State<org.ezand.telldus.core.util.RichBoolean> turnDeviceOff(int id)
                                                                                           throws org.ezand.telldus.core.TelldusException
        Will try to switch the device off. If the command fails, the current state of the device will be returned.
        Specified by:
        turnDeviceOff in interface org.ezand.telldus.core.repository.TelldusRepository
        Parameters:
        id - the device id.
        Returns:
        a RichBoolean instance with a negative value if device was switched off successfully, a positive value otherwise.
        Throws:
        org.ezand.telldus.core.TelldusException - if tdtool-command fails fatally.

      • dimDevice

        public org.ezand.telldus.core.domain.State<String> dimDevice(int id,
                                                             int level)
                                                      throws org.ezand.telldus.core.TelldusException
        Will try to dim the device. If the command fails, the current state of the device will be returned.
        Specified by:
        dimDevice in interface org.ezand.telldus.core.repository.TelldusRepository
        Parameters:
        id - the device id.
        level - the dim-level value (0-255).
        Returns:
        the current dim-level value (0-255) after the operation is finished.
        Throws:
        org.ezand.telldus.core.TelldusException - if tdtool-command fails fatally or if the dim value could not be retrieved from the command result.
